snippet.title: How high can you climb? Find out in this really hard puzzle game! NYMBLE - play on iOS and Android!
snippet.description:
APP STORE: https://apps.apple.com/app/nymble/id1542527234
GOOGLE PLAY: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vincentlodesign.nymble

Join Jack as he climbs the never-ending beanstalk! Nymble is a turn-based puzzle platformer mobile game. You play as Jack, who jumps over things to interact with them. Search for the seedling, plant it in the soil, and advance to the next level!

Online demo: https://www.crazygames.com/game/nymble

FEATURES
▶ Turn-based action: swipe to move or jump over things
▶ Explore 5 exciting worlds, 100 unique puzzles, with more on the way ...
▶ Fight monsters & enemies, each with their own special abilities
▶ Vibrant, hand-crafted pixel art and animations
▶ Captivating orchestral soundtrack
▶ In-app purchase to remove ads

1. Mobile-friendly controls. Swipe to move or jump over things.
Help Jack complete each level by planting the seedling in the soil. If monsters can reach you, they will move after your turn is over—so be sure to plan ahead!

2. Encounter unique enemies, each with their own abilities.
From shape-shifting slimes to living chess pieces. Maybe some of the monsters will even help you complete the level ... if you can outsmart them!

3. Hours of gameplay. Explore 5 exciting worlds and 100 levels.*
Put your puzzle-solving skills to the test. Climb the magical beanstalk to enter the next world each time you defeat a boss.
*With more levels on the way.

Enjoying Nymble? Stay connected on:

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/nymblegame
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/NymbleGame/

Keep on jumpin'
